page.title: 10Services in Stevington
page.content: Every property in Stevington is connected to the main electricity supply.Many people rely on this as their main source of power for heating,cooking and general purposes. There is no main gas supply but calor gas can be stored either in bottle form or in tanks stored beside premises.Oil is used in some houses for heating.This also has to be stored in tanks.All properties are connected to the main water supply but a few have only an external water tap.The majority of buildings are joined to the main sewage system but some have to rely on cess pits in order to reduce the load on the main sewer.Most people are telephone subscribers.Every home has a radio set and almost all have a television set.Some people own C.B.radio systems and can talk to people all over the world.
